attributes.action: Ban the manufacture and sale of new non-energy efficient domestic products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the current climate change crisis I ask the government to ban the manufacture and sale of new non-energy efficient domestic products such as white goods, televisions & light bulbs, thus putting the onus on manufacturers to produce energy efficient products rather than expecting the consumer to choose (often more expensive) energy efficient goods.

rejection.details:
This petition is very similar:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/homeworking/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
